.. _colors-label:

Colors
======

This option provides color selection for the lines representing Perimeter, Cutouts, Insets 
and Label profiles. Expanding **Colors** will show the following:

.. image:: /_static/images/colors.png
    :width: 40%
    :align: center

|

An additional option called **Fill Faces**, when selected, the profiles will be filled with 
their corresponding selected color. Use it to highlight features like Insets, Cutouts, or 
Perimeter to create something fun.
